actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act Amendments of 1970 to authorize grants to Eisenhower College, Seneca Falls, N.Y.

summary.text: Authorizes grants to Eisenhower College, Seneca Falls, New York, out of 10 percent of the amounts received from the sale of silver coins bearing President Eisenhower's likeness.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act Amendments of 1970 to authorize grants to Eisenhower College, Seneca Falls, N.Y.
